entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is mentioned as the one who gave Dudley a brand-new television. She is not physically present in the scene but her gift is being used by the Dursleys.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is described as sitting down between Dudley and Uncle Vernon at breakfast.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin and is described as being glued to the television screen all summer.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Dudley's father and is described as a large, beefy man with very little neck and a lot of mustache.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is an escaped convict who is being reported on by the television news.

relationships.description: Harry and Dudley are sitting at the same table, indicating that they coexist in the same space.
Harry and Uncle Vernon are also sitting at the same table, indicating that they coexist in the same space.
Dudley is focused on the television screen all summer, indicating a strong relationship between him and the TV.
